creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Panel of soft rust colored velvet with a design of bats and double peach in greyed-green. Wide, running border design of lotus blossoms and leaves. Binding of rust colored satin brocade. There are many restorations in this piece which is badly worn in places. Seamed up middle. Lining of rust-rose silk of cloud pattern.
title: Panel
